duties_responsibilities.duty: Wash, rinse, and sanitize dishes, pots, pans, utensils, and small wares.
Maintain cleanliness of kitchen area including floors, drains, walls, and shelves.
Assist with kitchen deliveries and proper storage of products.
Provide excellent customer service and address customer needs in a timely manner.
Maximize sales potential through proper procedures for prepping, storing, rotating, stocking, and merchandising product.
Follow established procedures, including health and sanitation, and maintain a clean and sanitary working environment.
Perform opening, mid, and closing duties as assigned and report safety hazards.
Perform other duties as assigned by leadership.
